Brand.name: Brandº
Brand.title: ºøthe Burning Vengeanceøº
Brand.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøIn a faraway place known as Lokfar there was a seafaring marauder called Kegan Rodhe. As was his people's way, Kegan sailed far and wide with his fellows, stealing treasures from those unlucky enough to catch their attention. To some, he was a monster; to others, just a man. One night, as they sailed through the arctic waters, strange lights danced over the frozen wastes. There was something hypnotic about them; it was something that drew them to it like moths to a flame. Trekking across the frozen waste, they came to a cave covered in ancient runes. The meaning of the runes long lost to them, Kegan led the way inside. There, inside a perfect cage of ice floated a dancing column of flame. There was no way such a thing should be burning, especially not in this place. However, its movement was as hypnotic as a siren's song, captivating and seductive. While the others stayed back, Kegan could not help but approach it while holding out his hand...ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThat is the last thing Kegan Rodhe remembers, for now his body belongs to Brand. It is a creature of olden times, perhaps even a casualty of the Rune Wars. It is known in ancient texts as the Burning Vengeance. It is a creature of pure fiery hate that exists for no other reason than to lay waste the world of men and yordles. No one is quite sure how Brand found his way to Valoran, but he began his predations at once. Overcome by Demacian forces, he was given a choice: fight within the confines of the League or die. Naturally, he chose to use his destructive powers in the League, for now...ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºø''This place will burn, not by cinder flying or breath of wind, but by the vengeance of my hand.''øºøºøºøºøº
º-- Brandº
Brand.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøIn a faraway place known as Lokfar there was a seafaring marauder called Kegan Rodhe. As was his people's way, Kegan sailed far and wide with his fellows, ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøYou can deter enemies from standing near their minions by setting them ablaze, due to Conflagration.øºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøYou can use Brand's abilities in a variety of combinations to maximize his damage in different situations.ºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøPyroclasm bounces randomly between enemies, so try to cast it on a small group of enemies if you want to hit the same target multiple times.øºøºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºBrand must land an ability before his combo is able to get started. Dodging his Sear or Pillar of Flame will disrupt his rhythm.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøTry to move away from allies when you see Pyroclasm being cast. The initial missile speed is slow, which should give your team time to react.øºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøBrand's passive allows him to excel in poking engagements. Be careful not to lose too much health before fighting.ºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: Searº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºBrand launches a ball of fire forward that deals magic damage. If the target is ablaze, Sear will stun the target for 2 seconds.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºBrand launches a ball of fire forward that deals ºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºø magic damage.º

Blaze:ººøºøºø If the target is ablaze, Sear will stun the target for 2 seconds.ºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºøPillar of Flameº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøAfter a short delay, Brand creates a pillar of flame at a target area, dealing magic damage to enemy units with the area. Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºøºøAfter a short delay, Brand creates a pillar of flame at a target area, dealing øºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºø magic damage to enemy units within the area.ºøºøº

Blaze:ººøºøºøºø Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage from Pillar of Flame.ºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºøConflagrationº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøBrand conjures a powerful blast at his target, dealing magic damage to them. If the target is ablaze, Conflagration spreads to nearby enemies.øºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºøBrand conjures a powerful blast at his target, dealing ºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºø magic damage. º

Blaze:ººøºøºø If the target is ablaze, Conflagration spreads to nearby enemies.ºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºPyroclasmº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøBrand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire, dealing magic damage each time it bounces. If a target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will priotize champions for the next bounce.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºøBrand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire, dealing ºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøº magic damage each time it bounces up to 5 bounces.ºøºøº

Blaze:ººøºøºøºø If a target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will prioritize champions for the next bounce.øºøºøºøº

passive.name: Blazeº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøBrand's spells light his targets ablaze, dealing 2% of their maximum Health in magic damage per second for 4 seconds.ºøºøºøºøºøº
